## RLog.(constructor)

Constructs a new [RLog](./rlog.rlog.md) instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(config?: PartialRLogConfig, tag?: string, parent?: RLog, sinks?: LogSinkCallback[], enrichers?: LogEnricherCallback[], correlation_id?: string);
```
